Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions

You can book an appointment by calling us, filling out the contact form above, or visiting our clinic in person. We recommend calling for urgent cases.

Please bring any previous medical records related to your eye health, a list of current medications, and arrive 15 minutes early to complete paperwork.

Yes, we provide emergency eye care services. For urgent cases, please call us immediately or visit the nearest emergency room.

We accept most major insurance providers. Please contact us to verify your specific insurance coverage before your appointment.
